title: 2cube studio
description: UI/UX design project focused on 2cube studio visualization software, created using Figma and Photoshop. This project aimed to improve usability and efficiency for architects and designers.

title: Traveling
description: UI/UX design project developed using Figma and Photoshop. This project focused on creating a user-friendly experience for travelers, from itinerary planning to booking accommodations.

title: Shopify
description: UI/UX design project tailored for Shopify platforms using Figma and Photoshop. This project involved optimizing e-commerce experiences, from product browsing to checkout.

title: Architecture
description: UI/UX design project focused on architectural visualization software, created using Figma and Photoshop. This project aimed to improve usability and efficiency for architects and designers.
